content.description:
Grab two crimps on in the quartz and dead point to the lip of the boulder and top out. 

  The crack is off limits.
content.location: Left most line on the boulder, starts just left of the crack in obvious quarts chunk.

content.description: Stand start in the horizontal seam just to left off the tree. Make a big move up and left to a good crimpy-gaston work your feet out left and put all your weight into the gaston to match hand, stand up to a good crimp up and top out.
content.location: One the shorter square block right next to the massive Godzilla Boulder. This is the right most line on the right face.

content.description: Start in the obvious massive jug just to  the left of 'Light the Fuse'. Make a long move or your bump your way up with your right hand to a decent sidepull crimp, move your feet around and make use of the left hand side pull right above the starting hold. and stand up to the same high crimp as for 'Light the Fuse' and top out.
content.location: On the right side of the squared off block this starts on th obvious jug on the right side and climbs start up, sharing many holds with 'Light the Fuse'

content.description:
Sit start on the jug undercling, pull up into the crack and climb it, topping out on good holds. 

  This would be a really cool line if it had 5 - 10 more feet of climbing, as it is so short I can't give it more than 1 star.
content.location: On the left side of the left face the squared off block, start on the obvious undercling and climb the crack.

content.description:
A nice but small collection of boulders that are "way out there" by Pawtuckaway standards. 

  A fun place to venture out to if you are looking for something new or trying to avoid crowds on the weekend.
